name: Final Fantasy XI: The Voracious Resurgence
summary: Final Fantasy XI: The Voracious Resurgence is an episodic story series update to Final Fantasy XI that began release in 2020. Like add-ons previously released for the game, the story series is introduced as part of a regular version updates. Unlike those add-ons, The Voracious Resurgence does not require an additional purchase to access.
